info.name: Alex's Roblox Theme
info.description:
My Roblox theme: it makes stuff look awesome
v0.0.3
info.additionalInfo:
CHANGELOGS!
----------v0.0.3----------
It's been a little while since I've updated this theme, but new additions have been added.

- The blue 'Verified' icon now rotates on hover, anywhere! (Profile & Catalog). There is an issue though with clicking on it- the box that explains the Verified badge does not rotate on hover. The issue is complicated... but it probably won't matter. I may find a workaround later on!
- Modified the search box in Catalog, now beginning border (most border) removal and more stuff!
- Borderless styling has started. Please note that some things will still have borders, but I will try to make it look as cool as possible!
- The white transparent bar will soon become customizable - as soon as I figure it out, but it is coming soon!
- Minor changes to the View All button seen on the Discover page as well as the other pages using the View All button for games. (slight reposition via margin)
02/07/23
----------v0.0.2----------
- ICON ANIMATIONS ADDED!!! this is super cool, hovering over the settings, robux, roblox, premium (only the profile premium icon have the animation, but i will fix that) and "see more" buttons show an animation and its super cool - i will add more though so stay tuned

- Alert and success prompts are fixed!

-Updates to the blurbar are added, along with the sidenav menu

- Rounded borders on a lot of things
----------v0.0.1----------
v0.0.1 Changelog

- Added cool blurry navbar (super cool)

- ALERT AND SUCCESS PROMPTS NEED TO BE FIXED! temporarily hidden because of the blurry navbar - these need to be visible and fixed

- removed border from search bar prompt
- added border radius to multiple things

- added "From: " next to sender name in the Messages page
- transition effect added for the buttons on the page (except navbar - will be fixed)

NEXT VERSION TO DO :

- FIX ALERT PROMPTS!! 
- remove most borders for clean design
- start working on the home page complete redesign
